com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.sourcing

Class EventReplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.sourcing.EventReplayer

  • public final class EventReplayer
extends Object
    Organises a collection of Events for replaying or collection in the desired order.
